text: Hey guys
It's Ro
It is spring and I wanted to make a carrot themed
recipe (my mom loves carrot cake so it gave me many ideas), and I thought let's make something yummy and bite
size so that's exactly what we're gonna be doing today. Today
We are gonna be making carrot cake balls. The things you'll need to make these carrot cake balls will be two cups of shredded
carrots, one cup of dark brown sugar, 3/4 cup of all-purpose flour,
6 tablespoons of unsalted butter, 1 large egg, 2 tablespoons of vanilla buttercream, forth a teaspoon of baking soda,
3/4 teaspoon of baking powder, quarter teaspoon of salt, half a teaspoon of vanilla
extract, 1 teaspoon of ground cinnamon and a pinch of nutmeg
Then the things you'll need to decorate the carrot cake balls will be Green royal icing in a piping bag fitted with a number
16 tip and
Orange royal icing in a piping bag fitted with a number 4 tip, some biscuit cookies and some white chocolate.
First step to making these cake balls is mixing together all of the dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl pour in flour
baking powder, baking soda, salt,
cinnamon and nutmeg.
Then whisk together until everything is well combined and set off to the side now in a medium bowl mix together your wet ingredients
and brown sugar the butter pour it in brown sugar vanilla extract and
One full egg then once again mix together until well combined
We've got everything we need for all of the shredded carrot and the wet ingredients into the dry bowl then
Using a spatula mix together until no more dry ingredients are showing and just a note
This is gonna be a thick batter
time to pour it into a pan you can really use any
Pan you want because when you make cake balls you crumble the cake after it bakes anyways
But I'm using an 8 inch round pan just be sure to grease it
And I've also lined the bottom with a piece of parchment paper that I cut out to fit to scoop all of it in there
boop, boop, boop, boop
Now the cake is ready to bake heat your oven to 350 degrees and bake for
35 minutes while the cake is baking I'm gonna make some decorations this part is totally optional
Because if you just make the little cake balls. They are delicious
They are adorable, but I'm being a little extra
And I want to put little carrots on top so in front of me
I have a cutting board that I've taped down a piece of wax paper and over here
I have royal icing that I've put into piping bags. Dyed orange and green the orange
I am using a number 4 tip and the green a number 16 is a very small
Star tip starting with the orange on top of the wax paper type zigzags that are touching each other
But not making a full triangle
Just like that then make as many as you'd like I'm gonna put one on top of each cake fall
And then use the green icing to pipe the carrot top and don't worry about them
Looking similar all carrots can look a little different after your cake has baked to give it plenty of time to cool to room temperature
to crumble the cake
I'm gonna be using a stand mixer
You can do this by hand it just takes longer doing it that way, and I want some carrot cake balls
So I'm gonna be using my stand mixer first step break your cake in the big pieces
You can just use your hands and put them into the mixer mix on a low speed until you getting a coarse
Crumble we're gonna open this up again and add a scoop of butter cream frosting. This is 2 tablespoons then again
We're gonna mix it on a low speed until the consistency starts to look like play-doh cake is ready in front of me
I have a cookie sheet Aligned with a piece of wax paper so the cake balls
don't stick and using a mini ice cream scoop look how small he is
I would say this is equivalent to 1 tablespoon so if you don't have a scoop of this small
just use a tablespoon scoop but that will work to scoop some cake
Gently roll and place on to your wax paper
Boop - just keep doing this until you've balled all of your cake
Once you've made all of your cake balls pop them in the freezer to chill for 30 minutes
Then we're gonna dip them welcome to the decorating station while my cake balls were in the freezer
